name: string-replace
description: Replace pattern in string at specified path using regex substitution

input.description: Any JSON object containing a string value at the specified path

path.description: Dot-separated path to the string field (e.g., 'data.message')

pattern.description: Regex pattern to replace (e.g., '\d+' for digits, 'hello' for literal text)

replacement.description: String to replace matches with (can be empty string to delete matches)

output.description: Modified object with pattern replaced in string at path, or original object if path doesn't exist or value is not a string
